TopicTitle: KSP.exe has stopped working on start up

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program - 1.0.5.1028 (WindowsPlayer) Steam
Operating System: Windows 10
Processor:  Intel Core i5 M560 @ 2.67GHz
RAM:  4 GB
System Type:  64 bit
GPU: NVIDIA GeForce GT 420M  (973MB)
build id = 01028
2015.11.11
 
Description:
When I try to launch the game from Steam, or direct from the exe I get the following message:
"KSP.exe has stopped working, A problem caused the program to stop working correctly.  Windows will close the program and notify you if a solution is available."
I have never been able to play this game since I bought it.  I just did a complete re-install of Windows 10 hoping that would solve the issue but it didn't.
It is an unmodded version of the game.
 
Link to Log file:  http://1drv.ms/1OTMDM3
 
I hope someone can help me solve this.
 
Thanks,
SV
Have you made sure your graphics card driver is up to date? From what I understand Windows 10 does a bad job in this area.

29 minutes ago, maceemiller said:

Have you made sure your graphics card driver is up to date? From what I understand Windows 10 does a bad job in this area. 

That was the problem...  I installed the newest drivers and it started working.

Thanks for the response.

SV
